a.title: Greenon Junior/Senior High School Students (7th-12th Grade)

div.a: Greenon Junior/Senior High School Students (7th-12th Grade)

p.span:
Greenon Students and Families!
Please make sure you begin your distance learning by checking for communication from your teacher or teachers on their usual method of communication. This may include:
the teacher's app for parents
the parent's email
the student's greenonschools.org email
Google Classroom
If you can't locate information from your student's teacher(s) or if you are not able to access the work they've shared, please check our Google Drive for a download of available work. In most cases, this will be the same work your teacher has already shared.
Families can download school work from their student's teacher(s) to print at home,by visiting our Google Drive Folder hereor clicking on the link for your student's school below.
Enon Primary
Indian Valley
Greenon Junior High School
Greenon Senior High School
If you do not see a teacher's folder, please refresh your browser.
These download folders are one way for parents to access information being shared by their child's teacher. Please make sure to check the teacher's app or your email for communication from your child's teacher about school work during the mandated closure.
Students in 7-12th grade should check their student email account and Google classroom daily.

div.div:
120 S. Xenia Street, Enon, OH 45323
Phone 937-864-1202 | Fax 937-864-2470
